quartznet-15x5_en.description: QuartzNet-15x5 ASR using CTC beamsearch decoder with language model, trained on 7,050 hours of audio data (English).  Please see to the stt_en_quartznet15x5 NeMo model for more info.

quartznet-15x5-greedy_en.description: QuartzNet-15x5 ASR using CTC greedy decoder, trained on 7,050 hours of audio data (English).  Please see to the stt_en_quartznet15x5 NeMo model for more info.

matchboxnet-3x1x64_subset.description: Audio keyword/command recognition using MatchboxNet architecture, trained on 12 classes from the Google Speech Commands Dataset.  Please see to the commandrecognition_en_matchboxnet3x1x64_v2_subset_task NeMo model for more info.

vad_marblenet.description: Voice Activity Detector (VAD) using MarbleNet architecture - classifier with two labels:  background and speech.  Please see the vad_marblenet model for more info.

distilbert_intent.description: DistilBERT joint intent/slot classifier, trained on the NLU-Evaluation-Data dataset.

distilbert_qa_128.description: DistilBERT question/answering with maximum sequence length 128, trained on SQuAD v1.1 dataset.

distilbert_qa_384.description: DistilBERT question/answering with maximum sequence length 384, trained on SQuAD v1.1 dataset.

distilbert_sentiment.description: DistilBERT text classifier for sentiment analysis, trained on the Stanford Sentiment Treebank (SST-2) dataset.

distilbert_ner.description: DistilBERT token classifier for Named Entity Recognition (NER), trained on the GMB (Groningen Meaning Bank) dataset.

fastpitch_hifigan.description: TTS ensemble using FastPitch model for MEL spectorgram generation and a HiFiGAN model vocoder.  Female voice for speaking English.
